protect_net.label: Protect Net
protect_net.description: Collapse pressure that prioritizes defending the crease. Allows more perimeter space but denies high-danger areas.
best_use: When opponent has elite shooters in the slot
risks: Opponents can walk the perimeter uncontested

contain_puck.label: Contain Puck
contain_puck.description: Balanced defensive pressure. Applies moderate puck pressure while maintaining defensive structure.
best_use: When you want low-risk, stable defence
risks: Can be too passive vs fast teams

normal.label: Normal
normal.description: Even-pressure coverage. Slightly more active than Contain Puck, but not aggressively hunting the puck.
best_use: When you want to generate counter-attacks
risks: Can be caught in-between if opponent cycles well

puck_side_attack.label: Puck Side Attack
puck_side_attack.description: Aggressively attacks the puck carrier on the puck side. Creates turnovers but can open seams.
best_use: When opponent D makes risky passes

high_pressure.label: High Pressure
high_pressure.description: Full-aggression mode. Forces quick decisions and is best used in short bursts.
risks: Very dangerous if opponent has elite passers
